description: Main entry point of a Flutter application for the Recipe Explorer app, setting up theme, providers, and navigation structure.

classes.name: RecipeExplorerApp
classes.description: Root widget that sets up the app with theme, providers, and home screen.

classes.name: RootScaffold
classes.description: Stateful widget managing bottom navigation and screen switching.

classes.name: _RootScaffoldState
classes.description: State object for RootScaffold handling navigation index and building UI.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main function that runs the Flutter app.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for RecipeExplorerApp and RootScaffold widgets.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for RootScaffold widget.
